  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2932</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2932</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comsoc: Laboratori de Biologia</string>
            <string language="en">Comsoc: Biology laboratory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Comsoc: Biologielabor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comsoc : Laboratoire de biologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comsoc: Laboratório de biologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comsoc: Laboratorio di biologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Comsoc: Εργαστήριο της βιολογίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col·lecció de recursos sobre Biologia distribuïts en cinc apartats:
- Pràctica amb la simulació d'una epidèmia.
- Simulacions sobre els següents temes: els éssers vius, la cèl·lula, bioelements i biomolècules, genètica, evolució i ecologia.
- Glossari de termes biològics.
- Personatges rellevants en el camp de la Biologia (Pasteur, Severo Ochoa, Darwin, Mendel, etc.).
- Enllaços a una selecció de pàgines sobre els temes tractats.</string>
            <string language="en">Selection of resources for biology in five sections:  Practical activity with a simulation of an epidemic;  Simulations on: living creatures, the cell, bioelements and biomolecules, genetics, evolution and ecology;  Glossary of biological terms;  Outstanding people in biology (Pasteur, Severo Ochoa, Mendel, etc.);  Links to webpages on the subjects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ecologia</string>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
            <string language="es">ecología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">biologia humana</string>
            <string language="en">human biology</string>
            <string language="es">biología humana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">invertebrat</string>
            <string language="en">invertebrate</string>
            <string language="es">invertebrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">microbiologia</string>
            <string language="en">microbiology</string>
            <string language="es">microbiología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vertebrat</string>
            <string language="en">vertebrate</string>
            <string language="es">vertebrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl der Betriebsmittel für Biologie in fünf
Kapiteln: - praktische Aktivität mit einer Simulation einer 
Epidemie; - Simulationen an: lebende Geschöpfe, die 
Zelle, bioelements und Biomoleküle, Genetik, Entwicklung und 
Ökologie; - Glossar der biologischen Bezeichnungen; - 
hervorragende Leute in der Biologie (Pasteur, Severo Ochoa, Mendel, 
usw..); - Links zu den Webseiten auf den Themen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélection des ressources pour la biologie dans 
cinq sections : - activité pratique avec une simulation d'une 
épidémie ; - simulations en fonction : créatures 
vivantes, la cellule, bioelements et biomolécules, génétique, 
évolution et écologie ; - glossaire des limites biologiques ; 
- personnes exceptionnelles dans la biologie (Pasteur, Severo 
Ochoa, Mendel, etc...) ; - liens aux pages Web sur les sujets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seleção dos recursos para a biologia em cinco 
seções: - atividade prática com uma simulação de uma 
epidemia; - simulações sobre: criaturas vivas, a pilha, 
bioelements e biomolecules, genetics, evolução e ecology; - 
glossário de termos biológicos; - povos proeminentes na 
biologia (Pasteur, Severo Ochoa, Mendel, etc..); - ligações 
aos Web pages nos assuntos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Selezione delle risorse per biologia in cinque 
sezioni: - attività pratica con una simulazione di un'epidemia;
- simulazioni sopra: creature viventi, la cellula, 
bioelements e biomolecole, la genetica, sviluppo ed ecologia; - 
glossario dei termini biologici; - gente eccezionale nella 
biologia (Pasteur, Severo Ochoa, Mendel, ecc.); - collegamenti 
ai Web pagi sugli oggetti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για τη βιολογία σε 
πέντε τμήματα: - Πρακτική δραστηριότητα με μια προσομοίωση 
μιας επιδημίας  - Προσομοιώσεις σε: ζωντανά πλάσματα, 
το κύτταρο, τα bioelements και τα βιομόρια, η γενετική, η 
εξέλιξη και η οικολογία  - Γλωσσάρι βιολογικών όρων  
- Σημαντικοί άνθρωποι στη βιολογία (Pasteur, Severo 
Ochoa, Mendel, κ.λπ....)  - Συνδέσεις με τα webpages 
στα θέματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschliche Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wirbellos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrobiologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirbeltier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie humaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">invertébré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">microbiologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vertébré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biologia humana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">invertebrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">microbiology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">invertebrato</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">vertebrato</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
